title: JAWS 10.0.512 screen reader
description:
JAWS 10.0.512 Screen Reader + crack - virus scanned using AVG 8.0 latest.

Follow the instructions exactly to install properly:


1) Run J10.0.512.exe to install JAWS, and install to default directory.

2) Make sure JAWS is not running (you can run previous version of JAWS to do next steps).

3) Copy these four files to the Program Files/Freedom Scientific/JAWS/10.0 folder (the folder where jfw.exe is):

CLKERN.DLL

JFW.EXE.cracklock

jhook.clb

Jaws 10 Crack.exe


4) Now run "Jaws 10 Crack.exe", follow steps and this will be successful.

5) Now run the Dongle Emulator installer which is the file Dongle.exe, and complete the installation.

6) Run, enjoy and leave a comment if you need assistance.


***** Please note, after you have installed the crack, JAWS will present itself as being the earlier 10.0.418 BETA version. This is not the case!

The crack works by changing a version string to make JAWS think it is still the earlier beta version. You are actually running the 512 release one though!

You can install the RealSpeak Solo voice with this release and it runs fine, no extra steps necessary.

Also important: Do not use the Update feature in the JAWS About menu!! This will probably kill the crack.

I am not blind but I do this to help the Blind Community, as I know a few people who need but cannot afford this ridiculously expensive software! Like, what the heck? Adobe Photoshop CS4 is less than half the cost of this. *****
